授業目的: The purpose of this course is to help you improve your abilities to communicate in English.  The course will help you familiarize yourself with the Listening sections of the TOEIC test.
到達目標: One important goal of this course is that you will learn the appropriate words and expressions in both everyday and business situations.  You will also have opportunities to practice a debate or a short presentation.
授業方法:
Listening, having a conversation, practicing a debate or a short presentation.
